text: The Tommy Tiernan Show is an Irish chat show presented by Tommy Tiernan. It was first broadcast on RTÉ One on 5 January 2017. The first two series aired on Thursday evenings, with the third series moving to a Saturday evening slot. The premise of the show is that host Tommy Tiernan and the audience have no idea who the guests will be until they walk out onto the stage, with no pre- prepared questions or research being carried out. ==Series== ==Episodes== ===Series 1 (2017)=== ===Series 2 (2018)=== ===Series 3 (2019)=== ==References== ==External links== * The Tommy Tiernan Show at RTE Category:2017 Irish television series debuts Category:2010s Irish television series Category:Irish talk shows Category:RTÉ original programming
title: The Tommy Tiernan Show
